name: Speedgame 2019 - AI
description:
GamesForFun entry to Speedgame 2019

NOTICE:! 

After level 2, levels 3, 4, 5 and "execute plan" (=complete game) will all become available.

There are some stability issues with game, especially if you dont have fast machine enough. Therefore in the end I submitted a version that does have all 5 levels, but requires you to play only first two.

If you have fast machine enough, you can play levels 3-5. Slower ones probably get a crash bug during playing.
